info.name: GrayScale-ish for DuePuntoZero
info.description:
GrayScale-ish is a userstyle I made for DuePuntoZero.
I just thought I would spread some Friendica love here on userstyles.org
This is for frndc.com, so common sense tells you to change that to your site (line 3).
info.additionalInfo: Perpetual WIP I only have firefox in mind, so if you use Chrome, you may have problems. Uses "Glyphicons Free" icon pack by Jan Kovařík (www.glyphicons.com).
